data.title: Felix Neugart on LinkedIn: #startup #helsinki #slush #nrw #pavillon #ecosystem #innovation
data.meta_description: A snowy #startup adventure - in a year characterized by a number of remarkable startup events the visit to the great Slush show in #Helsinki with State… | 10 comments on LinkedIn
data.text:
5 reasons why investors should look at startups in the Balkans 🇲🇰🇷🇸🇲🇪🇧🇦🇽🇰🇭🇷🇸🇮🇦🇱🇧🇬 Yesterday on the amazing event in Zurich, Jakob Modéer brought up 5 very good points on why an investor should look at startups in the Balkans: 1) Untapped potential all around due to the region having been overlooked in the past 2) Same money gives longer runways to startups due to lower running costs in the region 3) Founders are super resilient and have been through it all, refuse to give up 4) A highly skilled workforce especially in tech 5) Countries are on the road to EU Membership Thank you Impact Hub Zürich, PurposeTech, Swiss EP - Swiss Entrepreneurship Program, Greater Zurich Area and Kickstart Innovation for hosting me in this epic innovation space in the heart of Zürich! Together with Zdenek Fred Fous, Ina Jovicic, Andrej Vckovski, Jan Peloza, MBA and other amazing founders & legends from the Balkans, we promoted our startups, culture, eco-system and opportunities to Swiss investors, hoping to bring more deals and visibility to our region.

The new edition of the Austrian Startup Monitor is finally out and was presented yesterday at Federal Ministry of Labor and Economy. 🎉 🤩We are excited to share with you some of this year’s highlights from Carinthia: ▪️The average number of employees rose slightly in comparison to last year, from 3,3 to 3,9. ▫️The number of female founders has sunk and it is now 11,5%, in contrast to last year’s 15%. ▪️The share of green/social impact startups is 57,7%, which is on the higher end when set side by side to other federal states ▫️4,2% of all startups acquired more than 500000€ of external equity. We want to congratulate the whole AustrianStartups team on this amazing project and thank them, together with the Carinthian partner build! Gründerzentrum Kärnten for helping positively shape the ecosystem. 💪 📌If you want to know more interesting facts about startups in Austria, you can check out the monitor online at this website: https://lnkd.in/ddqQ9tNG ©️Austrian Startups #asm #austrianstartupmonitor #carinthia #kärnten #startups #suc #startupcarinthia #innovation #entrepreneurship #scaleups #interesting #facts #founders #gründer #readytoinnovate #strongertogether

HOW TO PITCH 4X IN 24 HOURS OR: RUHRHUB ON TOUR IN HAMBURG. What a blast. What an incredible opportunity. What a great group of diverse founders. I am glad for this unique opportunity: Being part of the most recent addition of ruhrHUB on Tour. This time, the city of choice was Hamburg. And besides being a great city, you also offer a great local startup ecosystem. (I’m talking to you, Hamburg). So here we were. Six founders. Four meetings in our calendars. Four chances to pitch. Four chances to get direct feedback. A feedback round after each pitch. Quick pivots. Awesome individuals to learn from. Thank you for having us: YPOG Hamburg Invest Next Commerce Accelerator (NCA) AI.STARTUP.HUB Together with portance on tour: vGreens [Timo Quast can give you the perfect pitch] SIMPL [Dr. Can Azkan can give you the perfect pitch] Nutrilotse [Stefanie Biermann can give you the perfect pitch] odacova [Timo Sievernich can give you the perfect pitch] Medirion (Markus Geffe can give you the perfect pitch) Thank you to Svenja Tietje and Benjamin Heitmann for the great company and guidance on site. Thank you for the great organization, Dr. Yvonne Braukhoff Happy pitching! // Dom PS: Don't have your hands in your pocket when pitching! 😉 #perfectpitch #hamburg #startup #ontour #entrepreneurship #gründen #founderstories #gründer #ruhrhub #nrw #impact

☀️ Get Ready, Spain! 🎉 BayLoop Ventures has teamed up with Slush to host the most electrifying event of 2025 - Slush’D in Bilbao! Think you’ve seen it all in tech and entrepreneurship? Think again. Slush’D is the powerhouse event where only the best startups, the boldest entrepreneurs, the sharpest visionaries, and the elite investors gather to redefine the cutting edge. This isn’t just another networking event - it’s where the future of innovation stakes its claim. 🚀 Mark your calendars, prepare your pitches, and get ready to rub shoulders with the top tier of the global innovation scene right here in Spain. This is where you bring your A-game, connect with the best, and show the world what you’re made of. Stay glued to our page and follow Bilbao Slush'D for all the updates you’ll need to be a part of this monumental event. It’s more than just an event; it’s where legacies are built. Let’s light up Bilbao like never before! #BilbaoSlushD #Startups #Ecosystem #InnovationOnFire #NextBigThing

What to say…. Reflecting on our recent OUT OF THE BOX.NRW event, we are reminded of the vital role this competition plays in shaping the startup landscape in North Rhine-Westphalia. Throughout the competition, participating startups had the chance to present themselves as founders and showcase their innovative ideas, demonstrating what true innovation looks like. Mona Neubaur, Minister for Economic Affairs of the State of North Rhine Westphalia (Ministerium für Wirtschaft, Industrie, Klimaschutz und Energie des Landes NRW) said: “With a great deal of courage, technological know-how, and unconventional thinking, founders in North Rhine-Westphalia are driving the digital and climate-neutral transformation forward. We honor this tremendous commitment with the state award OUT OF THE BOX.NRW, highlighting the immense innovative power of the NRW startup scene. The winners of #OOTBNRW demonstrate how startups with forward-looking digital and sustainable business models can be successful in North Rhine-Westphalia and beyond.” Dominik Gross said: “Without startups, Germany's economy has no promising future. Only through technology transfer from local startups can our companies remain world-class. NRW is the fastest-growing startup ecosystem in Germany. The "Top 24 of 2024" list already shows how diverse the potential is. We are particularly proud that the best startup in NRW comes from our region, OWL.” This years winner, Albert Gorlick from Synctive, said: “Starting a business in NRW, especially in the Bielefeld region, is unique. Our target group is the mechanical engineering sector. If we do it right, the first 100 customers are right on our doorstep.” Stay tuned as we will be introducing our winners in more detail over the coming weeks! #OOTBNRW #Startups #NRW #DigitalTransformation #MWIKE

Stepping out of our comfort zones can be intimidating, especially for us introverts. The mere thought of networking events can trigger anxiety, making it feel like navigating in unknown waters. But there is this unique blend of excitement that comes with the challenge - an anticipation of growth and new connections that could redefine our journey. Here's to navigating the delicate dance between anxiety and excitement, because it is often in those moments of vulnerability that we discover our true strengths. Introvert or not 😉 if you are in the game for innovation, growth, and disruptive ideas in Legaltech and/or B2B and visiting sTARTUp Day, let's connect and meet up. Drop me a message or comment below if you are interested in grabbing a coffee during the event. ✨ #sTARTUpDay #Networking #LegalTech #B2B #EmbraceTheChallenge

Exciting news awaits you at this year's Hinterland of Things Conference! As you know, the #Hinterland24 is all about bringing together startups, technology, and business decision-makers. That’s why we’re excited to announce our new final pitch event that’s coming to our stage: the OOTB.NRW startup competition! OUT OF THE BOX.NRW (OOTB.NRW) is a startup competition initiated by Ministerium für Wirtschaft, Industrie, Klimaschutz und Energie des Landes NRW(MWIKE) of North Rhine-Westphalia (NRW). 𝗠𝗔𝗞𝗘 𝗜𝗧 𝗢𝗡𝗧𝗢 𝗧𝗛𝗘 "𝗧𝗢𝗣 𝟮𝟰 𝗜𝗡 𝟮𝟬𝟮𝟰" 𝗟𝗜𝗦𝗧 Out of all the applications, a committee of NRW’s top VCs will hand-select the “Top 24 in 2024” List of NRW’s startups and put them on the radar! To do so, we’re teaming up with VCs such as Simon Capital, coparion, Cusp Capital, neoteq ventures and more! 𝗖𝗔𝗦𝗧 𝗬𝗢𝗨𝗥 𝗩𝗢𝗧𝗘 𝗙𝗢𝗥 𝗧𝗛𝗘 𝗧𝗢𝗣 𝟭𝟬 We’ll need ALL OF YOU to vote for the Top 10 and give them the chance to not only win 50k – thanks to the NRW.BANK – but also to pitch in front of the Hinterland of Things audience of 2,500 attendees, among them Top Voices from the startup scene, including Verena Pausder, Dr. Gesa Miczaika, Valerie B., Frank Thelen, Magdalena Oehl, and many other prominent figures from the German tech scene! 𝗡𝗢𝗪: 𝗜𝗦 𝗬𝗢𝗨𝗥 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗥𝗧𝗨𝗣 𝗥𝗘𝗔𝗗𝗬 𝗧𝗢 𝗪𝗜𝗡? The call for applications starts TODAY! The criteria are simple: 1 Your startup is based in NRW 2 Your startup was founded within the past 3 years 3 Your startup focuses on digital processes, services, or business models Apply now and reach your next milestone: https://lnkd.in/gUF9FeB Follow the OUT OF THE BOX.NRW LinkedIn Account to stay tuned for even more exciting news! Founders Foundation gGmbH | Dominik Gross | Gabriela Pantring | Mona Neubaur #hinterlandofthings #ootbnrw #bielefeld #startuppitch #entrepreneurship #startup #pitchevent

🚀 Last week, we had the pleasure of hosting our Startup Brunch at the EU HQ (Berlaymont), featuring esteemed guests Marko Kaseleht, CEO and founder of SensusQ, Erik Markus Kannike, CSO of SensusQ, and Rokas Tamošiūnas , a serial entrepreneur and investor in defense startups. Unfortunately, Dimitrios Kottas, founder of Lambda , couldn't join us due to unforeseen events. The focus of our discussion was on dual-use startups, civil-defense ventures that enhance the EU's economic competitiveness, strategic autonomy, and deterrence capabilities. Over a delightful brunch featuring Spanish delicacies like tortilla de patatas, Spanish ham, and empanada, we engaged in insightful discussions on dual-use startups. Here are my 5 key takeaways: 1. Fragmented Market: EU defense procurers prefer local startups, posing a challenge for cross-border sales. Founders are finding innovative solutions, like partnering with local entities to navigate this issue. 2. Potential for Defense Buyers: Technology's role in enhancing deterrence was emphasized. The book “Unit X” by Raj M Shah and Christopher Kirchhoff illustrates how startups can revolutionize the defense industry. 3. Ecosystem Importance: Building a dual-use startup ecosystem is crucial. While investors are organized, startups need a cohesive network. National ecosystems involving academia, corporates, the public sector, founders, and investors are the first step, followed by EU-wide connections. The “Regional Innovation Valley” initiative is a model to follow: https://europa.eu/!GD3v4N 4. Economic Competitiveness: Defense startups are branching into finance and manufacturing, showcasing their potential to boost the EU economy. 5. Beyond Funding: Initiatives like the NATO Innovation Fund and the European Defence Fund are good starts, but a well-connected ecosystem is essential for long-term success. This Startup Brunch was an enlightening experience, providing valuable insights into the burgeoning field of dual-use startups. I'm eager to connect with startups and investors in this space. Let's continue the conversation and foster innovation together! 💡 #Startups #Innovation #DualUse #EUeconomy #Defense #StrategicAutonomy #Entrepreneurship #Ecosystem #Investment

Thrilled to share that Ny Teknik has just unveiled Sweden's Best 33 Startup Companies, and the spotlight is shining on innovation! 🌟 What's even more impressive? Six of these trailblazing companies hail from Chalmers Ventures' stellar portfolio. 🚀🔬 Big congrats to: 🌟 Amferia | Anand Kumar Rajasekharan Saba Atefyekta 🌟 Atley Solutions | Milton Lönnroth Emma Aneheim Sture Lindegren 🌟 Elypta | Francesco G. Jens Nielsen Karl Bergman 🌟 Envue Technologies | Ellen Andréasson Christoph Langhammer Joachim Fritzsche David Albinsson 🌟 Modvion | Otto Lundman 🌟 Nyctea Technologies | Gustav Ferrand-Drake Andreas Dahlin Among these companies, Elypta and Modvion have been named 'gold companies' as this is their third year on the prestigious list. Atley Solutions has been included for two years. This is a testament to the incredible impact that scientists and entrepreneurs from Chalmers University of Technology and collaboration partners are making in the tech landscape. Their groundbreaking work is not only shaping industries but also setting the stage for future growth. 👏 Join me in celebrating the success of these extraordinary startups by checking out the video showcasing four of the standout companies from the list. ✨ You won't want to miss this glimpse into the future of Swedish innovation! And here's the real deal – you can meet some of these visionaries in person at the 33-list's live event in Stockholm on December 6th. #SwedishInnovation #StartupSpotlight #TechTrends

Exciting News! 🎉 We’re happy to share that Redstone has been ranked the 8th most active Pre-Seed and Seed investor in Germany by Sifted. 🇩🇪 The article shines a spotlight on our recent investments in Chipmetrics, UpHill Health, and Unchained Robotics. 🙌 It also mentioned our focus on some amazing global startup hotspots like Joensuu, Covilhã, and Paderborn. 😉 We can’t wait to keep supporting early-stage startups and playing our part in the vibrant startup scene in Germany and Europe. 🇪🇺 You can find the link to the article in the comments. CC: Samuli Sirén, Michael Brehm, Mickaël Bellaïche, Lars Haerle, Anastasia Gonotskaya, Kaj Hagros, Oskari Lehtonen, Lukas André, Marco Stutz, Chiara Decaroli, PhD, Martin Scherrer, Niklas Grunewald, Lucas Paul, Ben Scheidt, Mohamed F., Paul von Hinueber, Richard Würl, Marko Mandic, Frederike Wolff #VentureCapital #Startups #Innovation #Entrepreneurship #Investing #Redstone
